title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select items on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The item can only be selected after trying again.
Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first try.
EB: The expected behavior is that any item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
